sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_7889e8af4f51220023bf3879b110c730
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>incident</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>try</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	
	g_scratchpad.css            = gs.getProperty('css.base.color');
	g_scratchpad.hasAttachments = current.hasAttachments();
	g_scratchpad.managerName    = current.caller_id.manager.getDisplayValue();
	
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>surya.nair</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-08-23 13:11:17</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>7889e8af4f51220023bf3879b110c730</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>try</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_7889e8af4f51220023bf3879b110c730</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>surya.nair</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-08-01 09:07:26</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before_display</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=7889e8af4f51220023bf3879b110c730"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_325103044fb3120023bf3879b110c7e4
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>sc_req_item</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="sc_req_item">cat_item=8e88343e4f9e420023bf3879b110c769^EQ<item display_table="sc_cat_item" display_value="Documentum- User Administration" endquery="false" field="cat_item" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="8e88343e4f9e420023bf3879b110c769"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>EstimatedDelivery</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	// Add your code here
days = current.variables.fulfilment_days;
var durationInSecs = days * 86400;
var newDueDate;
var dc = new DurationCalculator();
addSchedule(dc);
dc.setStartDateTime(gs.nowDateTime()); 
if (dc.calcDuration(durationInSecs)) {
    newDueDate = dc.getEndDateTime();
}
    gs.log("New Due Date: " + newDueDate);  

function addSchedule(durationCalculator) {
    var scheduleName = "8-5 weekdays";
    var grSched = new GlideRecord('cmn_schedule');
    grSched.addQuery('name', scheduleName);
    grSched.query();
    if (grSched.next())
        durationCalculator.setSchedule(grSched.getUniqueValue(), gs.getUserTimeZone());
}

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>surya</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-05-30 13:42:13</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>325103044fb3120023bf3879b110c7e4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>11</sys_mod_count><sys_name>EstimatedDelivery</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_325103044fb3120023bf3879b110c7e4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>surya.nair</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-08-01 09:08:35</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=325103044fb3120023bf3879b110c7e4"/></record_update>
